plot: Anolkhi is a Marathi movie released in 1973. Produced & directed by Kamlakar Torne. The movie tells a story of how a little boy gets his make believe father home and tries to reunite the family.
title: Anolkhi
plot_es: Anolkhi is a Marathi movie released in 1973. Produced & directed by Kamlakar Torne. The movie tells a story of how a little boy gets his make believe father home and tries to reunite the family.
plot_en: Anolkhi is a Marathi movie released in 1973. Produced & directed by Kamlakar Torne. The movie tells a story of how a little boy gets his make believe father home and tries to reunite the family.
